question: A number is even if it can be divided by 2 without a remainder. Which of the following numbers is not even?
choices: only one of these is odd

question: Which of the following statements is a contradiction?
choices: B: No square is a circle.
C: Every even number is greater than 5.
D: Some even numbers are odd.
answer: D: Some even numbers are odd

question: A rectangle has a length of 8 and a width of 4. What is the perimeter of the rectangle?
If it is raining, then the streets are wet. If the streets are wet, then the cars will not pass. What can be concluded from this statement?
choices: The cars will not pass if it is raining
The cars will not pass even if it is not raining
If it is not raining, then the cars will pass
We cannot determine what to do
answer: The cars will not pass if it is raining
